spiritsExplanation: The workout primarily embodies the 'Flow & Rhythm' spirit, as indicated by the "Sequenced Flow" description and the inclusion of a consistent progression from one movement to the next, which signifies seamless transitions typical of pilates practices (score: 0.7). The 'Structured & Disciplined' spirit is also evident, suggested by the detailed sequence breakdown in the description (e.g., Plank + Glute Sequence, Lunge + Arms Sequence), reflecting a structured format with specific goals (score: 0.6). Although not primarily focused on intensity, some high-energy elements are present, inferred from user comments like "dripping sweat" and mention of endurance work, suggesting a challenging workout intensity (score: 0.4). Other potentials like 'Sport & Agility' or 'Outdoor & Adventure' were excluded due to the workout's home-based, non-sport-specific nature and indoor setting.
